+import java.util.random.RandomGeneratorFactory;
+
+/**
+ * @test
+ * @summary Checks if the random factory providers can be loaded when a SecurityManager is active
+ * @bug 8288475
+ * @run main/othervm/policy=java.policy -Djava.security.manager SecurityManagerFactory
+ */
+
+public class SecurityManagerFactory {
+    public static void main(String[] args) {
+        RandomGeneratorFactory.all().toList();
+    }
+}
\ No newline at end of file
